00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00032 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';
00033 
00034 // privileges checking
00035 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'r');
00036 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'w');
00037 
00038 if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00039     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00040 }
00041 
00042 // check if there is any active stock take proccess
00043 $stk_q = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM stock_take WHERE is_active=1');
00044 if ($stk_q->num_rows) {
00045     echo '<div class="errorBox">'.__('There is already stock taking proccess running!').'</div>';
00046 } else {
00047     // add new stock take
00048     if (isset($_POST['saveData']) AND empty($_POST['name'])) {
00049         utility::jsAlert(__('Stock Take Name must be filled!'));
00050         exit();
00051     } else if (isset($_POST['saveData']) AND !empty($_POST['name'])) {
00052         $data['stock_take_name'] = trim($dbs->escape_string(strip_tags($_POST['name'])));
00053         $data['start_date'] = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00054         $data['init_user'] = $_SESSION['realname'];
00055         $data['is_active'] = 1;
00056 
00057         $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00058         if ($sql_op->insert('stock_take', $data)) {
00059             // get latest stock take id
00060             $stock_take_id = $sql_op->insert_id;
00061             // criteria
00062             $criteria = ' WHERE (ist.skip_stock_take<1 OR ist.skip_stock_take IS NULL)  ';
00063                 // gmd
00064                 if ($_POST['gmdID'] != '0') {
00065                     $criteria .= ' AND b.gmd_id='.intval($_POST['gmdID']).' ';
00066                 }
00067                 // collection type
00068                 if ($_POST['collTypeID'] != '0') {
00069                     $criteria .= ' AND i.coll_type_id=\''.intval($_POST['collTypeID']).'\' ';
00070                 }
00071                 // location
00072                 if ($_POST['location'] != '0') {
00073                     $criteria .= ' AND i.location_id=\''.$dbs->escape_string($_POST['location']).'\' ';
00074                 }
00075                 // site/placement
00076                 if ($_POST['itemSite']) {
00077                     $criteria .= ' AND i.site LIKE \''.$dbs->escape_string($_POST['itemSite']).'\' ';
00078                 }
00079                 // classification
00080                 if ($_POST['classification']) {
00081                     $criteria .= ' AND (';
00082                     // each class
00083                     $arr_class = explode(',', $_POST['classification']);
00084                     $class_criteria = '';
00085                     foreach ($arr_class as $each_class) {
00086                         // check each class if its containing wildcard
00087                         if (strpos($each_class, '*') !== false) {
00088                             $each_class = str_replace('*', '%', $dbs->escape_string($each_class));
00089                             $class_criteria .= ' b.classification LIKE \''.$each_class.'\' OR ';
00090                         } else {
00091                             $each_class = $dbs->escape_string($each_class);
00092                             $class_criteria .= ' b.classification=\''.$each_class.'\' OR ';
00093                         }
00094                     }
00095                     // remove last OR
00096                     $class_criteria = substr_replace($class_criteria, '', -3);
00097                     $criteria .= $class_criteria.' )';
00098                 }
00099             // for debugging purpose only
00100             // emptying previous stock take item data
00101             $clean_q = $dbs->query('TRUNCATE TABLE stock_take_item');
00102             // copy all item data to stock take detail table
00103             $insert_q = $dbs->query("INSERT INTO stock_take_item (stock_take_id, item_id, item_code, title, gmd_name, classification, coll_type_name, call_number, location, status, checked_by, last_update)
00104                 SELECT $stock_take_id, i.item_id, i.item_code, b.title, g.gmd_name, b.classification, ct.coll_type_name, b.call_number, loc.location_name, 'm', '".$_SESSION['realname']."', NULL FROM
00105                 item AS i
00106     LEFT JOIN mst_item_status AS ist ON i.item_status_id=ist.item_status_id
00107                 LEFT JOIN mst_coll_type AS ct ON i.coll_type_id=ct.coll_type_id
00108                 LEFT JOIN mst_location AS loc ON i.location_id=loc.location_id
00109                 LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00110                 LEFT JOIN mst_gmd AS g ON b.gmd_id=g.gmd_id
00111                 $criteria");
00112             // get number of item on loan
00113             $item_loan_q = $dbs->query("SELECT COUNT(loan_id) FROM loan AS l WHERE is_lent=1 AND is_return=0");
00114             $item_loan_d = $item_loan_q->fetch_row();
00115             if (!$item_loan_d[0]) {
00116                 $item_loan_d[0] = 0;
00117             }
00118             // update data for item being loan
00119             $update_q = $dbs->query("UPDATE stock_take_item SET status='l' WHERE item_code IN (SELECT item_code FROM loan AS l WHERE is_lent=1 AND is_return=0)");
00120             // total rows inserted
00121             $total_rows_q = $dbs->query("SELECT COUNT(item_code) FROM stock_take_item WHERE status='m'");
00122             $total_rows_d = $total_rows_q->fetch_row();
00123             if ($total_rows_d[0] > 0) {
00124                 // update total_lost_item field value in stock_take table
00125                 $update_total_q = $dbs->query('UPDATE stock_take SET total_item_stock_taked='.$total_rows_d[0].', total_item_loan='.$item_loan_d[0].', total_item_lost='.$total_rows_d[0].", stock_take_users='".$_SESSION['realname']."\n' WHERE stock_take_id=$stock_take_id");
00126                 // write log
00127                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'stock_take', $_SESSION['realname'].' initialize stock take ('.$data['stock_take_name'].') from address '.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']);
00128                 utility::jsAlert(__('Stock Taking Initialized'));
00129                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.location.href = \''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/index.php?mod=stock_take\';</script>';
00130             } else {
00131                 // delete stock take data
00132                 $dbs->query('DELETE FROM stock_take WHERE stock_take_id='.$stock_take_id);
00133                 utility::jsAlert(__('Stock Taking FAILED to Initialized.\nNo item to stock take!'));
00134             }
00135             exit();
00136         }
00137     }
00138 
00139     // create new instance
00140     $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?action=new', 'post');
00141     $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Initialize Stock Take').'" class="button"';
00142 
00143     // form table attributes
00144     $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00145     $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00146     $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00147 
00148     /* Form Element(s) */
00149     // stock take name
00150     $form->addTextField('text', 'name', __('Stock Take Name').'*', '', 'style="width: 60%;"');
00151     // gmd
00152         // get gmd data related to this record from database
00153         $gmd_q = $dbs->query('SELECT gmd_id, gmd_name FROM mst_gmd');
00154         $gmd_options[] = array('0', __('ALL'));
00155         while ($gmd_d = $gmd_q->fetch_row()) {
00156             $gmd_options[] = array($gmd_d[0], $gmd_d[1]);
00157         }
00158     $form->addSelectList('gmdID', __('GMD'), $gmd_options);
00159     // collection type
00160         // get coll_type data related to this record from database
00161         $coll_type_q = $dbs->query('SELECT coll_type_id, coll_type_name FROM mst_coll_type');
00162         $coll_type_options[] = array('0', __('ALL'));
00163         while ($coll_type_d = $coll_type_q->fetch_row()) {
00164             $coll_type_options[] = array($coll_type_d[0], $coll_type_d[1]);
00165         }
00166     $form->addSelectList('collTypeID', __('Collection Type'), $coll_type_options);
00167     // location
00168         // get language data related to this record from database
00169         $location_q = $dbs->query("SELECT location_id, location_name FROM mst_location");
00170         $location_options[] = array('0', __('ALL'));
00171         while ($location_d = $location_q->fetch_row()) {
00172             $location_options[] = array($location_d[0], $location_d[1]);
00173         }
00174     $form->addSelectList('location', __('Location'), $location_options);
00175     // item site
00176     $form->addTextField('text', 'itemSite', __('Shelf Location'), '', 'style="width: 20%;"');
00177     // classification;
00178     $str_input = simbio_form_element::textField('text', 'classification', '', 'style="width: 60%;"');
00179     $str_input .= '<br />'.__('Separate each class comma sign. Use * for wildcard');
00180     $form->addAnything(__('Classification'), $str_input);
00181     // print out the object
00182     echo $form->printOut();
00183 }
